TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchema extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject

summary.span: An in-memory representation of an XML Schema, as specified in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [XML Schema Part 1: Structures](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1/) and [XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/) specifications.

span.span: An in-memory representation of an XML Schema, as specified in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [XML Schema Part 1: Structures](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1/) and [XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/) specifications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > - 不要使用来自未知或不受信任的源或位置的架构。Do not use schemas from unknown or untrusted sources or locations. 执行此操作将影响你的代码的安全性。Doing so will compromise the security of your code. > - XML 架构 （包括内联架构） 是本质上是容易受到拒绝服务攻击;不接受不受信任的方案中。XML schemas (including inline schemas) are inherently vulnerable to denial of service attacks; do not accept them in untrusted scenarios. > - 由于使用而引发的异常类，如类中，可能包含不应在不受信任的方案中公开的敏感信息。Exceptions raised as a result of using the class, such as the class, may contain sensitive information that should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios. 例如，属性的返回导致异常的架构文件的 URI 路径。For example, the property of an returns the URI path to the schema file that caused the exception. 不应在不受信任的情况下公开属性。The property should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios. 应正确处理异常，因此在不受信任的情况下不公开此敏感信息。Exceptions should be properly handled so this sensitive information is not exposed in untrusted scenarios. ## Examples 以下示例创建架构定义。The following example creates a schema definition. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlSchema Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlSchema Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlSchema Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlSchema Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlSchema Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlSchema Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的 XML 文件是前面的代码示例为生成的。The following XML file is generated for the preceding code example. [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlSchema Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlSchema Example/XML/source.xml#2)]

member this.AttributeFormDefault : System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaForm with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the form for attributes declared in the target namespace of the schema.

span.span: Gets or sets the form for attributes declared in the target namespace of the schema.

value.span: 值，该值指示是否需要用命名空间前缀限定目标命名空间的属性。

span.span: The value that indicates if attributes from the target namespace are required to be qualified with the namespace prefix.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该值必须是一个的下表中显示的值。The value must be one of the values shown in the following table. | 值 Value|描述Description| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------| ||架构中未指定属性窗体。The attribute form is not specified in schema.| ||必须用命名空间前缀限定目标命名空间的属性。Attributes from the target namespace must be qualified with the namespace prefix.| ||不需要用命名空间前缀限定目标命名空间的属性。Attributes from the target namespace are not required to be qualified with the namespace prefix.| 对于在目标命名空间中声明的所有属性，该值是全局默认值。This value is the global default for all attributes declared in the target namespace. 不同的属性来覆盖本地作用域使用此设置`form`属性。Individual attributes can override this setting for the local scope using the `form` attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDerivationMethod BlockDefault { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDerivationMethod get(); void set(System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaDerivationMethod value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the attribute which sets the default value of the attribute on element and complex types in the of the schema.

span.span: Gets or sets the attribute which sets the default value of the attribute on element and complex types in the of the schema.

value.span: 值，该值表示阻止派生的不同方法。

span.span: An value representing the different methods for preventing derivation.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `block`属性防止`complexType`或具有指定的从正在使用中的继承的派生类型元素`complexType`或元素。The `block` attribute prevents a `complexType` or element that has the specified type of derivation from being used in place of the inherited `complexType` or element. 此属性的值可以是空格分隔列表的限制、 扩展和替换，也可以包含的值`#all`或子集扩展、 限制或替换的列表。This attribute's value can either be a white space separated list of restriction, extension and substitution or the value can contain `#all` or a list that is a subset of extension, restriction, or substitution. 下表列出了可能的值的。The following table lists the possible values of . |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`None`|默认情况下，没有在架构中的类型派生的任何限制。By default, there are no restrictions on type derivations in the schema.| |`Empty`|重写默认派生方法，并允许在架构中的任何类型的派生。Overrides the default derivation method and allows any type derivations in the schema.| |`Extension`|默认情况下，此架构中的元素不能通过扩展派生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Extension. 仅适用于元素和复杂类型元素。Applies only to element and complex type elements.| |`Restriction`|默认情况下，不能由限制派生此架构中的元素。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Restriction.| |`Union`|默认情况下，此架构中的元素不能通过联合派生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Union. 仅适用于简单类型。Applies only to simple types.| |`List`|默认情况下，此架构中的元素不能通过列表派生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by List. 仅适用于简单类型。Applies only to simple types.| |`All`|`#all`。`#all`. 默认情况下，该架构中的元素不能通过任何方法派生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by any method.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 SOM 引用通过其他命名空间`import`或`include`元素，`XmlResolver`用于解析这些引用。If the SOM references other namespaces through the `import` or `include` elements, the `XmlResolver` is used to resolve these references. 如果冲突解决程序设置为`null`，这表示用户不需要有关解决`import`或`include`元素。If the resolver is set to `null`, this indicates that the user does not care about resolving `import` or `include` elements. 在这种情况下，未解析引用。In this case, the references are not resolved. 冲突解决程序后不缓存`Compile`方法完成。The resolver is not cached after the `Compile` method completes. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法在 Microsoft.NET Framework 2.0 版中已过时，并已替换为方法。The method is obsolete in the Microsoft .NET Framework version 2.0 and has been replaced by the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法使用类来解析外部引用中的架构包括、 导入，或默认情况下重新定义元素。The method uses the class to resolve external schemas referenced in include, import, or redefine elements by default. 可以通过传入 null 作为禁用的外部架构解析参数。You can disable resolution of external schemas by passing null as the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该值必须是一个的下表中显示的值。The value must be one of the values shown in the following table. | 值 Value|描述Description| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------| ||在架构中未指定元素窗体。The element form is not specified in the schema.| ||必须用命名空间前缀限定目标命名空间的元素。Elements from the target namespace must be qualified with the namespace prefix.| ||不需要用命名空间前缀限定目标命名空间的元素。Elements from the target namespace are not required to be qualified with the namespace prefix.| 对于在目标命名空间中声明的所有元素，该值是全局默认值。This value is the global default for all elements declared in the target namespace. 单个元素可以通过使用覆盖此设置为局部范围`form`属性。Individual elements can override this setting for the local scope by using the `form` attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `final`属性防止在指定的元素的派生类型或复杂类型。The `final` attribute prevents the specified type of derivation of an element or complex type. 此值可以包含`#all`或列表是 extension 或 restriction 的子集。This value can contain `#all` or a list that is a subset of extension or restriction. 下表列出了可能的值的。The following table lists the possible values of . |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`None`|默认情况下，没有在架构中的类型派生的任何限制。By default, there are no restrictions on type derivations in the schema.| |`Empty`|重写默认派生方法，并允许在架构中的任何类型的派生。Overrides the default derivation method and allows any type derivations in the schema.| |`Extension`|默认情况下，此架构中的元素不能通过扩展派生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Extension. 仅适用于元素和复杂类型元素。Applies only to element and complex type elements.| |`Restriction`|默认情况下，不能由限制派生此架构中的元素。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Restriction.| |`Union`|默认情况下，此架构中的元素不能通过联合派生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by Union. 仅适用于简单类型。Applies only to simple types.| |`List`|默认情况下，此架构中的元素不能通过列表派生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by List. 仅适用于简单类型。Applies only to simple types.| |`All`|`#all`。`#all`. 默认情况下，该架构中的元素不能通过任何方法派生。By default, elements in this schema cannot be derived by any method.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是此架构中的所有架构组件，以及包含使用任何架构的命名空间`include`元素。The is the namespace of all schema components in this schema as well as any schema included using the `include` element. 包括的架构必须具有相同目标命名空间与包含架构或具有未指定的目标命名空间。Included schemas must either have the same target namespace as the containing schema or have no target namespace specified.
